attributes.additional_details:
A temporary halt to entry of anyone who is not a UK citizen.
A 3 month amnesty for all illegals of any nature to come forward to have their right to stay determined,appeals etc.
After the 3 months all illegalls when found will -and new illegalls-will be deported without right to apply for right to stay(as amnesty has passed).
At this point a new policy can be in place to ensure
imigration is controled .
